title: Belle Vous Scissors Multipack (10 Pack) - 21cm/8.27 inch Overall Length - Sharp Stainless Steel Blades - Soft Comfort Grip Handles - for Office and Home - Multipurpose Craft Scissors
features: MULTIPACK OF SCISSORS: This set comes with 10 pairs of sharp cutting scissors. These scissors are suitable for left and right handed users. Each scissor measures 21cm (8.27 inches) overall and the blades measure 11.4cm (4.49 inches). Total weight of each pair of scissors is 57 grams.
ERGONOMIC SOFT RUBBER HANDLES: The handle on each pair of scissors is made of soft black and red rubber. This will give you a comfortable, smooth cut across any flat surface as well as a secure grip.

WIDE RANGE OF USES: Every pair of scissors in this set has been sharpened before being sent. This gives you a clean, crisp cut every time and makes them great for paper, cardboard, packaging, card, burlap, tape, crafting and scrapbooking. Can also be used for cutting patterns and basic alterations.
CAN BE USED ANYWHERE: These scissors are handy to have in the office or at home in the kitchen drawer. Since there are 10 pairs it means you will never not be without a pair.

DESIGNED FOR LIFE: Every product in our collection is built with purpose, blending function and style. Our thoughtfully crafted designs ensure lasting reliability and convenience when needed, ideal for any occasion.
description: Product Description Creative DIY Made Simple We offer versatile tools that make crafting a DIY easy Stylish Home Decoration Create a sleek, stylish aesthetic with our range of elegant home decor.
